CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 1, 1955, pg. 9, reads: "Gaines Annual Party - Hundreds of youngsters were treated to the annual Christmas party first started by the late George Gaines at his funeral parlor on Auburn Street, East Liberty.  This year, as she did last year, Mrs. Julia Gaines, his widow, shown in the center with the little boy on her lap, continued to perpetuate the party. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Julia Gaines seated with boy in lap in front of large group of children, in Gaines Funeral Home for annual Christmas party
